entity_action_chosen.command: give @s written_book{pages:['["",{"text":"do not believe the lies, angel","obfuscated":true,"color":"dark_red"},{"text":"\\n","color":"dark_red"},{"text":"He lies\\n\\n\\nlies\\n\\nlying\\n\\n\\n\\nlies","bold":true,"italic":true,"color":"dark_red"}]','{"text":"he\'ll never accept you back\\n\\nha\\n\\nhe lies\\n\\ni do not\\n\\ni only offer power","bold":true,"italic":true,"color":"dark_red"}','["",{"text":"ignore me if you wish...\\nbut then you will be stranded on an unforgiving world, with no friends and no power.\\n\\nforsake the gardener. i can give you power to defy him...","bold":true,"italic":true,"color":"dark_red"},{"text":"\\n ","color":"reset"}]','{"text":"just start with one small...kill\\n\\nthe effects of his curse could be bad, but once you get through them...power unending.","bold":true,"italic":true,"color":"dark_red"}'],title:Lies,author:"Error 404: Name Not Found",display:{Lore:["Light seems to bend around it."]}}
